ai-tha-ap421:0.3_0: The Elders, having given a bowl to the Elder Nun Chief Disciples
ai-tha-ap421:1.1_0: “I used to live in the past,
ai-tha-ap421:3.1_0: Carefully off the faults of others,
ai-tha-ap421:3.2_0: and no-one is found in me.
ai-tha-ap421:3.3_0: This is the bowl for me.
ai-tha-ap421:3.4_0: I’ll be a sage bearer of wealth;
ai-tha-ap421:4.2_0: or stood in the mango grove.
ai-tha-ap421:4.3_0: when my mind is out of desire,
ai-tha-ap421:4.4_0: then the sage ate on that occasion.
ai-tha-ap421:5.4_0: I went to the company of the Thirty-Three.
ai-tha-ap421:6.1_0: Thirty-six times I was lord of gods,
ai-tha-ap421:6.2_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap421:7.3_0: May I be happy and healthy!
ai-tha-ap421:7.4_0: This is the fruit of good deeds.
ai-tha-ap421:8.2_0: as well as copper is the wealth.
ai-tha-ap421:8.4_0: This is the fruit of good deeds.
ai-tha-ap421:9.1_0: The share of the river is shaking.
ai-tha-ap421:9.2_0: my wealth earned with its limbs.
ai-tha-ap421:9.3_0: I am not able to continue it,
ai-tha-ap421:9.4_0: This is the fruit of good deeds.
ai-tha-ap421:10.4_0: This is the fruit of good deeds.
ai-tha-ap421:11.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap421:11.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap421:11.4_0: This is the fruit of good deeds.
ai-tha-ap421:13.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap421:15.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Disciple.
ai-tha-ap421:16.1_0: (who had) reached maturity for the Elder Nun Cūlaka,
